name: Portfolio Grid
author: David Register

sections.description: Portfolio Plugin will display custom portfolio items into a grid in a responsive wen layout. Using javascript, it will create an interactive filter for portfolio items based on custom filter tags that each project is categorized under.
sections.installation:
1. Upload portfolio-grid to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create a page with the slug portfolio for the plugin to display the custom portfolio items
